title: Sample, ca. 1949
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 22 x 27 cm (8 11/16 x 10 5/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: 2/2 twill plaid with paired and unpaired warps and paired and unpaired wefts. Warp has stripes of yellow boucle that alternates with yellow three-ply yarn; a stripe of orange two-ply yarn, orange smooth yarn; a stripe of pink two-ply yarn; stripe of metallic gold yarn of grouped warp of flat metallic; double wrapped metallic; single wrapped metallic and yellow ply yarn; same stripe in silver and gray yarn. Weft has bands of yellow, orange, pink chenille paired with red flat metallic, orange smooth year, and paired flat and wrapped metallic gold and silver.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample, ca. 1949.
ca. 1949. Medium: cotton, synthetic
Technique: 2/2 twill. Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin. 1972-75-75.
